articles.description: A wiring issue with some Volkswagen Atlas SUVs may cause airbags to deploy late, windows to roll down on their own and brakes to engage inadvertently.
articles.content:
Volkswagen recalled 246,000 Atlas and Atlas Cross Sport SUVs in the U.S. and Canada because of a wiring issue that could cause problems with the airbags, windows and brakes of the cars.
